Bookshelf(Actions) Class Reference

A category of IBAction methods.  Most of those which involve the stark Selection invoke StarkEditor class methods to do the actual work.  Most of the Maintain methods invoke other methods in Bookshelf.m to do the actual work. More...

Detailed Description

A category of IBAction methods.  Most of those which involve the stark Selection invoke StarkEditor class methods to do the actual work.  Most of the Maintain methods invoke other methods in Bookshelf.m to do the actual work.

Member Function Documentation

- (IBAction) deleteAllDupes: (id)  sender  

Deletes all but one of the starks in each Dupe, so that the Dupe itself will be deleted.

Runs in a separate thread

- (IBAction) export: (id)  sender  

Performs the Export command.

Exports bookmark items to the external stores by performing all externalizers arrayed in the receiver's shig

- (IBAction) import: (id)  sender  

Performs the Import command.

Imports bookmark items from the external stores by performing all internalizers arrayed in the receiver's shig

- (IBAction) saveMove: (id)  sender  

An action wrapper for -saveMoveToNewPath: that gets the new path from a modal sheet dialog.

Does nothing if user cancels the sheet.
